3DxWare Software Development Kit (SDK) Overview

The 3DxWare SDK provides the resources you, the developer, need to add 3D mouse support to application software. See Supported Platforms for the specific platforms and compilers supported by this SDK.

See Copyright and License Information for the terms and conditions of the 3DxWare SDK license and this documention copyright notice.

The following parts are provided:

  • 3DxWare SDK Libraries, including the 3DxWare Input Library and the 3DxWare Math Library
  • All include files required to integrate with the 3DxWare libraries
  • Installation for the libraries, documentation, demos, and source code
  • This documentation explaining how to use the 3DxWare libraries and demos
  • A detailed section on advanced navigation modes, parameters and other 3D Mouse concepts and information. Programmers are strongly advised to study the documentation if aiming to have their 3D mouse implementations certified by 3Dconnexion.
  • Programming examples
